All your files in one secure location, accessible anywhere.

Findr stores your most important files in one secure location. Access them wherever you need, share and collaborate with friends, family, and co-workers.

Stay productive, wherever you are

Never let location be an issue when accessing your files. Findr has you covered for all of your file storage needs.

Securely share files and folders with friends, family and colleagues for live collaboration. No email attachments required!
